subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Big East, which a decade ago was considered one team deep in talent, placed eight teams in the N.C.A.A. tournament and started the weekend with five in the Round of 16.
snippet: The Big East, which a decade ago was considered one team deep in talent, placed eight teams in the N.C.A.A. tournament and started the weekend with five in the Round of 16.
